item.description:
Join members and friends of the MoonPool Coven for our Bi-Monthly Celebration and Discussion group. This is a wonderfully enriching, educational and fun circle. Learn about different ways of celebrating the turns of the Wheel of the Year, meet new people and learn to share personal experiences, stories, laughter and joy in the spirit of the seasons!

All activities at the UU Church of Haverhill, 15 Kenoza Ave Haverhill, MA 01830

Free-will donations and non-perishable food items for the Church are appreciated as are appropriate snacks to share with the group.

OPEN CIRCLE: 7PM - Imbolc (Ground Hog Day)
Imbolc, literally "in milk", refers to the beginning of lactation in the farm animals, in preparation for the birth of the young. Imbolc is the Awakening of the light, when the first signs of new growth begin to appear, and the plans for the new year are laid. Seed catalogs are purchased, and farmers ready to sow their crops when the time comes. Animals prepare to bring forth life in their turn. The first Awakening is the awakening to the possibilities of the new year.

There will be no class this week
item.name: Imbolc Celebration - Open Circle
